name: LAMP (Prokopev Aleksandr)
description:
Light is your power!

Control the lamp and protect it from the forces of darkness with the help of light!

Rotate the lamp so that the darkness does not overtake and break it. You do not need to turn on the light, it is always on.

 If the lamp collides with a monster, it starts to glitch and the brightness of the light drops. If the light finally breaks, then you will lose one life-a light bulb. After the second breakdown, you will be eaten. 

Big monsters are killed only by bright light!

Dark Worm

For 100 coins, you can buy an additional light bulb, if there is no one. Just double tap on the lamp💡

The Night Light slows down the monsters

Night Light
